text:
Taglibs 1.1.2

When using <x:foreach> the server goes down when more than 20 simultanous users
performing a request in which an <x:foreach> is executed.
Stops responding. cpu usage 100%.

When only a few users, system is slow.
(<x:foreach> looping over 300 'records' takes 10 seconds when only 1 user is active)
creator: wim@wg.be

text:
BZ#27717 does not indicate which bug-fix release of JSTL 1.1 it refers to. 
When 27717 is resolved, if you are still seeing this behavior, please re-open 
this report.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27717 ***
creator: rahul@apache.org
